scripts.publish-dev-npm: env BUILD_ENV=dev npm run build && npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publish-stage-npm: env BUILD_ENV=stage npm run build && npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish-prod-npm: env BUILD_ENV=prod npm run build && npm run release-npm && npm run public-npm
scripts.release-npm: npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish --tag release
scripts.public-npm: npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-dev-cdn: aws s3 cp dist s3://payment-components-dev --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive --cache-control max-age=3
scripts.publish-stage-cdn: aws s3 cp dist s3://payment-components-stage --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive --cache-control max-age=3
scripts.publish-prod-cdn: aws s3 cp dist s3://payment-components-prod --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive --cache-control max-age=3
